text: @JoeBiden Then why is it ok for hospitals to get extra money for Covid-19 cases which is leading to massive fraud and false diagnosis to help with the national fear mongering? Or are you talking about all the expendable lives that Gov. Cuomo killed by stocking up the ill in nursing homes?
